page.title: 06ERRIGAL,MAIN ROAD,A5.
page.content: There is a local bus service running from Omagh to Ballygawley and also Express buses travelling from Derry to both Belfast and Dublin and from Derry to Letterkenny. Express buses stop only at Omagh and Ballygawley. On Saturday 16th July 1983 a massive landmine,buried in a culvert,was detonated from a nearby vantage point overlooking the road and claimed the lives of five members of the Ulster Defence Regiment travelling in an army land-rover. The explosion blew a deep crater in the road which had to be closed for some days until repairs could be carried out.
